name: Filmora Thumbnail
summary: Learn about .FSTHUMB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Wondershare Filmora is a video-editing program available for Windows and Mac. It allows users to create and edit video projects, which are saved as .WFP files.

When a user is browsing Filmora's menus, they may see thumbnail images representing their WFP files. These images are saved as FSTHUMB files. They are stored in the same folder as their associated WFP file.

description: An FSTHUMB file is a thumbnail image created by Wondershare Filmora, a video-editing program. It is used to show a thumbnail of a video-editing project in Filmora's menus. FSTHUMB files are not meant to be opened.

instructions: FSTHUMB files are not meant to be opened. You can view a Wondershare Filmora project's FSTHUMB file while browsing menus that show thumbnails in Filmora.
